critique: The document outlines the establishment and purpose of the Afghanistan and Pakistan Strategic Partnership Office (APSPO). As the President, the primary emotions I want to elicit are joy (through promoting security and stabilization), and perhaps a bit of surprise (due to the establishment of a new organization). There might be a sense of reduced fear as the US transitions to a normalized diplomatic presence. There isn't much to suggest sadness, anger, or disgust. The language is formal and bureaucratic, not designed to evoke strong emotions. The initial scores reflect this assessment. Upon review, I think the initial scores are reasonable, but I will adjust them slightly to better reflect the intended emotions.
